sentences: This session (6-9 June 2012, Geneva, Switzerland) concluded the Panel’s consideration of the recommendations from the IAC Review by approving the functions of the IPCC Secretariat and TSUs, and the Communications Strategy.

WGI-12 and IPCC-36: During these meetings (23-26 September 2013, Stockholm, Sweden), WGI finalized its AR5 contribution: “Climate Change 2013: The Physical Science Basis.” The Panel then approved the WGI SPM and accepted the underlying report, including the Technical Summary and annexes.
enb_long_title: 42nd Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-42)
